Row.Help: TXT_KEY_TECH_SIMPLE_TOOLS_HELP
Row.Quote: TXT_KEY_TECH_SIMPLE_TOOLS_QUOTE

Row.Help: TXT_KEY_TECH_COMPLEX_TOOLS_HELP
Row.Quote: TXT_KEY_TECH_COMPLEX_TOOLS_QUOTE

Row.Help: TXT_KEY_TECH_FIRE_HELP
Row.Quote: TXT_KEY_TECH_FIRE_QUOTE

Row.Help: TXT_KEY_TECH_GATHERING_HELP
Row.Quote: TXT_KEY_TECH_GATHERING_QUOTE

Row.Help: With [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Complex Tools[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hunting[ENDCOLOR] becomes more effecient. Reveals [ICON_RES_DEER] [COLOR_YELLOW]Deer[ENDCOLOR] on the map. Provides access to the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hunter[ENDCOLOR], a unit that helps with settlement growth. Your citizens may now go out and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Forage[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The perils of duck hunting are great - especially for the duck."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Walter Cronkite.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Cooking increases the size of your units' brains. Food just tasted better over wood burning pits and even increased morale.
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Humanity is mind-controlled and only slightly more conscious than your average zombie."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - David Icke.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Makes your community more organized, under your firm and benevolent leadership. Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chieftain's Hut[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The problem of social organization is how to set up an arrangement under which greed will do the least harm."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Milton Friedman.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Enables you to train [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Scouts[ENDCOLOR] and build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Outpost[ENDCOLOR] improvement in [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]Forests[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]Jungles[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"A Scout is never taken by surprise; he knows exactly what to do when anything unexpected happens."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Robert Baden-Powell.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Enables you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Food Storage[ENDCOLOR] building for your city.
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The human body is the magazine of inventions, the patent-office, where are the models from which every hint was taken. All the tools and engines on earth are only extensions of its limbs and senses."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - R. W. Emerson.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Reveals [ICON_RES_FISH] [COLOR_YELLOW]Fish[ENDCOLOR], [ICON_RES_PEARLS] [COLOR_YELLOW]Pearls[ENDCOLOR], and [ICON_RES_CRAB] [COLOR_YELLOW]Crab[ENDCOLOR] on the map. Allows the building of [COLOR_CYAN]Skara Brae[ENDCOLOR] wonder.
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"He who would search for pearls must dive below."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - John Dryden.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Enables your Citizens to communicate. Also allows you to establish [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Embassies[ENDCOLOR] in other civilizations.
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"By and large, language is a tool for concealing the truth."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - George Carlin.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Unlocks the powerful [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Savage[ENDCOLOR], an effective unit against settlements. Enables building the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Palisade[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The best weapon against an enemy is another enemy."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Friedrich Nietzsche.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Ascend the throne of your kingdom and build your [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Palace[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"To rule is easy, to govern difficult."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Archer[ENDCOLOR]. Unlocks the wonder, [COLOR_CYAN]Temple of Artemis[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: TXT_KEY_TECH_ARCHERY_QUOTE

Row.Help: Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Shrine[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_CYAN]Ggantija Temples[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Just as no one can be forced into belief, so no one can be forced into unbelief."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Sigmund Freud.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Your citizens become skilled in rudimentary Art. They are now able to create [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cave Paintings[ENDCOLOR]. Reveals [ICON_RES_DYES] [COLOR_YELLOW]Dyes[ENDCOLOR] on the map.
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Drawing is still basically the same as it has been since prehistoric times. It brings together man and the world. It lives through magic."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Keith Haring.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Unlocks the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Warrior[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The problem with today's humanity is that people judge everyone else but still don't see their own mistakes."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Unknown.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Worker[ENDCOLOR] who can contruct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Farms[ENDCOLOR]. Reveals [ICON_RES_WHEAT] [COLOR_YELLOW]Wheat[ENDCOLOR], [ICON_RES_SUGAR] [COLOR_YELLOW]Sugar[ENDCOLOR], [ICON_RES_CITRUS] [COLOR_YELLOW]Citrus[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: TXT_KEY_TECH_AGRICULTURE_QUOTE

Row.Help: Allows your cities to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Granary[ENDCOLOR], which provides [ICON_FOOD] Food, helping your cities grow larger. Reveals [ICON_RES_PORCELAIN] [COLOR_YELLOW]Porcelain[ENDCOLOR] on the map.
Row.Quote: TXT_KEY_TECH_POTTERY_QUOTE

Row.Help: Allows your workers to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Camps[ENDCOLOR] on sources of [ICON_RES_DEER] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Deer[ENDCOLOR], [ICON_RES_IVORY] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ivory[ENDCOLOR], [ICON_RES_FUR] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fur[ENDCOLOR], and [ICON_RES_TRUFFLES] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Truffles[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: TXT_KEY_TECH_TRAPPING_QUOTE

Row.Help: Your citizens become effecient traders. Reveals [ICON_RES_IVORY] [COLOR_YELLOW]Ivory[ENDCOLOR], [ICON_RES_INCENSE] [COLOR_YELLOW]Incense[ENDCOLOR], and [ICON_RES_TRUFFLES] [COLOR_YELLOW]Truffles[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The propensity to truck, barter and exchange one thing for another is common to all men, and to be found in no other race of animals."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Adam Smith.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Allows Workers to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mines[ENDCOLOR] to increase the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of map tiles, and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chop Forests[ENDCOLOR], allowing the construction of other improvements. Reveals [ICON_RES_GOLD] [COLOR_YELLOW]Gold[ENDCOLOR], [ICON_RES_SILVER] [COLOR_YELLOW]Silver[ENDCOLOR], and [ICON_RES_SALT] [COLOR_YELLOW]Salt[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: TXT_KEY_TECH_MINING_QUOTE

Row.Help: Your citizens can now count, aiding in keeping track of inventory, and advancing trade. Reveals [ICON_RES_SPICES] [COLOR_YELLOW]Spices[ENDCOLOR] and [ICON_RES_SILK] [COLOR_YELLOW]Silk[ENDCOLOR] on the map.
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Dave, stop. Stop, will you? Stop, Dave. Will you stop, Dave? Stop, Dave. I'm afraid."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - HAL 9000.[NEWLINE][TAB]
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Never trust a sheep."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Ryan Stiles.[NEWLINE][TAB]
Row.Help: Reveals [ICON_RES_COW] [COLOR_YELLOW]Cattle[ENDCOLOR] and [ICON_RES_SHEEP] [COLOR_YELLOW]Sheep[ENDCOLOR] on the map.
TXT_KEY_TECH_THE_WHEEL_HELP
Row.Quote: TXT_KEY_TECH_THE_WHEEL_QUOTE

Row.Help: Mineralogy allows further regfinement of natural minerals. Reveals [ICON_RES_GEMS] [COLOR_YELLOW]Gems[ENDCOLOR], [ICON_RES_MARBLE] [COLOR_YELLOW]Marble[ENDCOLOR], and [ICON_RES_JEWELRY] [COLOR_YELLOW]Jewelry[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Confucious.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Set.Help: Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cargo Ship[ENDCOLOR], used to establish lucrative sea-based [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Trade Routes[ENDCOLOR]. Also allows you to build military and economic ships, useful for exploration and harvesting resources in the water like [ICON_FISH] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fish[ENDCOLOR] and [ICON_PEARLS] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pearl[ENDCOLOR]. Also reveals [ICON_WHALE] [COLOR_YELLOW]Whales[ENDCOLOR] on the map.

Row.Help: Allows workers to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pastures[ENDCOLOR] on [ICON_RES_COW] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cows[ENDCOLOR] and [ICON_RES_SHEEP] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Sheep[ENDCOLOR]. Also reveals [ICON_RES_HORSE] [COLOR_YELLOW]Horses[ENDCOLOR] and [ICON_STAR] [COLOR_YELLOW]Camels[ENDCOLOR], which are used to build powerful mounted units.
Row.Quote: TXT_KEY_TECH_ANIMAL_HUSBANDRY_QUOTE

Row.Help: Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Caravan[ENDCOLOR], used to establish lucrative Trade Routes. With [ICON_RES_SALT] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Salt[ENDCOLOR] resources, these Caravans will increase their range. Reveals [ICON_RES_WINE] [COLOR_YELLOW]Wine[ENDCOLOR] on the map.
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"I have not told half of what I saw."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Marco Polo.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Text: Allows the use of basic tools, such as sharpened stones. The [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Lean-to Shelter[ENDCOLOR] is available for building. Enables you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Laborers[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Settlers[ENDCOLOR], and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{TXT_KEY_UNIT_AUTOCHTHON}[ENDCOLOR] (a unit with no maintenance cost, able to self-sustain naturally). Reveals [COLOR_YELLOW]Stone[ENDCOLOR]. Unlocks [COLOR_CYAN]Theopetra Cave[ENDCOLOR], the oldest known man-made structure, providing a powerful boost to your economy and production.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Edged tools are dangerous things to handle, and not infrequently do much hurt."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Agnes Repplier.[NEWLINE][TAB]
Your citizens can now build more complex tools than chipped rock. Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Primitve Archer[ENDCOLOR], a very weak ranged unit.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Man is a tool-using animal. Without tools he is nothing, with tools he is all."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Thomas Carlyle.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Your citizens will now have control of [COLOR_]Fire[ENDCOLOR]. Enables you to train [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cavemen[ENDCOLOR] and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Shaman[ENDCOLOR] (a ranged unit with limited range), and to build a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Campfire[ENDCOLOR] in Cities.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Out of the frying pan, into the fire."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Tertullian.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Takes your gathering culture to an new level. Reveals [ICON_RES_BANANA] [COLOR_YELLOW]Bananas[ENDCOLOR] and [ICON_RES_BERRIES] [COLOR_YELLOW]Berries[ENDCOLOR] on the map and allows you to build a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Midden[ENDCOLOR] for your settlement and [COLOR_CYAN]Wonderwerk Cave[ENDCOLOR] which will help in resource production.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Better than any argument is to rise at dawn and pick dew-wet red berries in a cup."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Wendell Berry.[NEWLINE][TAB]
